name: Slap A Cube WebXR
description:
Slap-A-Cube is a fast-paced Whac-A-Mole inspired game is a proof of concept that I made to experiment with the WebXR packages made by De-Panther.

It has been tested only on Quest 2. I'll probably make a tutorial in the near future to share the development process, stay tuned ;)

De-Panther WebXR Exporter: https://github.com/De-Panther/unity-webxr-export
